Html:

I'm very surprised you see that on x86, are you sure you aren't running x64?

In any case, I suggest you upgrade to NAudio 1.5 which is compiled for AnyCPU

Mark

See:

http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/3972/sinttulofx.png

Can you explain me how I can upgrade 1.5 Naudio please?
just click Downloads above and replace your copy of NAudio.dll with the new one.

ok, now i have another problem:

that is not a problem in NAudio, but in DjKinect, which is an application I don't know anything about

Mark
